meanings.definition: A game played with dominoes, typically involving matching and counting tiles.
meanings.sent1: During family game night, we always enjoy playing cooncans together.
meanings.sent2: The children were excited to learn how to play cooncans with their grandparents.
meanings.sent3: After losing at cooncans, Sarah jokingly blamed her bad luck on the tiles.
meanings.sent4: The strategy in cooncans is like a puzzle where you must match and count the tiles.
meanings.sent5: The sound of tiles clicking together in cooncans is oddly satisfying.

meanings.definition: The set of dominoes used in the game of cooncans.
meanings.sent1: Grandma keeps her cooncans in a special box to keep them organized.
meanings.sent2: The cooncans were beautifully crafted with intricate designs on each tile.
meanings.sent3: Tom accidentally dropped the box of cooncans, causing a domino effect on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The cooncans gleamed under the sunlight, showcasing their smooth surfaces.
meanings.sent5: The weight of the cooncans in his hand made him feel the quality of the game.
